name: Arkadian Warriors
description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2, Local Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). Define your legacy young Arkadian Warrior - Defeat the evil Gorgon herself as soldier, archer or sorceress and return the land of Arkadia back to it's people. Unlock the full game now. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.
